TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatisticFormula extends System.Object

summary.span: 计算统计公式。

span.span: Calculates statistical formulas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式可以松散分为以下类别： 分发，包括反分发;测试;和基本统计公式。Formulas can be loosely grouped into the following categories: distributions, including inverse distributions; tests; and basic statistical formulas. 每个组具有其输入和返回值相关的共同特征。Each group has common characteristics with respect to their input and return values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova (double probability, string inputSeriesNames);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova(float64 probability, string inputSeriesNames) cil managed
Public Function Anova (probability As Double, inputSeriesNames As String) As AnovaResult
public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AnovaResult ^ Anova(double probability, System::String ^ inputSeriesNames);

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的输入范围为 0 到 1。

span.span: The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: inputSeriesNames
param.span: 两个或更多输入序列的名称。

span.span: Names of two or more input series.

param.span: 每个序列在方法调用时都必须位于序列集合中，并且具有相同数量的数据点。

span.span: Each series must exist in the series collection at the time of the method call, and have the same number of data points.

summary.span: Anova 公式可确定在两组或更多组数据的平均值之间是否存在统计方面的重大差异。

span.span: The Anova formula determines the existence or absence of a statistically significant difference between the mean values of two or more groups of data.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As AnovaResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3") ``` ```csharp AnovaResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Anova(.05, "Series1,Series2,Series3"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double BetaFunction (double m, double n);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 BetaFunction(float64 m, float64 n) cil managed
Public Function BetaFunction (m As Double, n As Double) As Double
public: double BetaFunction(double m, double n);

param.name: m
param.span: Beta 函数的第一个值。

span.span: First value for the beta function.

param.name: n
param.span: Beta 函数的第二个值。

span.span: Second value for the beta function.

summary.span: Beta 函数计算 Beta 函数值。

span.span: The beta function calculates the beta function value.
Beta value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.BetaFunction(2.3, 6.2); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Correlation (string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Correlation(string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Correlation (firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Correlation(System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第一个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第二个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 相关公式显示两个随机变量之间存在的关系的强度。

span.span: The correlation formula shows the strength of the relationship that exists between two random variables.

returns.span: 两组数据之间的相关值。

span.span: Correlation value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果输入的序列不具有相同数目的数据点，该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Correlation("Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Covariance (string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Covariance(string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Covariance (firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Covariance(System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第一个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第二个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: 协方差公式衡量两个随机变量之间可能存在的依赖关系的程度。

span.span: The covariance formula measures the degree of dependence that may exist between two random variables.

returns.span: 两组数据之间的协方差值。

span.span: Covariance value between the two groups of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果输入的序列不具有相同数目的数据点，该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Covariance("Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double FDistribution (double value, int firstDegreeOfFreedom, int secondDegreeOfFreedom);

public: double FDistribution(double value, int firstDegreeOfFreedom, int secondDegreeOfFreedom);

param.name: value
param.span: 分布所需的 F 值。

span.span: The F value for which you want the distribution.

param.name: firstDegreeOfFreedom
param.span: 第一个自由度。

span.span: First degree of freedom.

param.name: secondDegreeOfFreedom
param.span: 第二个自由度。

span.span: Second degree of freedom.

summary.span: F 分布公式计算 F 分布的概率。

span.span: The F distribution formula calculates the probability for the F-distribution.
Probability for the F distribution.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FDistribution(6.31, 15, 7) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FDistribution(6.31, 15, 7); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.FTestResult FTest (double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.FTestResult FTest(float64 probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function FTest (probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As FTestResult
public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::FTestResult ^ FTest(double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: probability
param.span: alpha 值。

span.span: The alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的范围为 0 到 1。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第一个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第二个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: F 检验公式使用 F 分布执行双样本 F 检验，并可用于查看样本是否具有不同的方差。

span.span: The F-test formula performs a two-sample F-test using F distribution, and is used to see if the samples have different variances.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果输入的序列不具有相同数目的数据点，该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the input series do not have the same number of data points. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As FTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp FTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.FTest(0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double InverseNormalDistribution (double probability);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 InverseNormalDistribution(float64 probability) cil managed
Public Function InverseNormalDistribution (probability As Double) As Double
public: double InverseNormalDistribution(double probability);

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的输入范围为 0 到 1。

span.span: The acceptable input range is between 0 and 1.

summary.span: 反正态分布公式计算标准正态累积分布的反函数。

span.span: The inverse normal distribution formula calculates the inverse of the standard normal cumulative distribution.

summary.span: 该分布平均值为 0，标准偏差为 1。

span.span: The distribution has a mean of 0 and a standard deviation of one.

returns.span: 正态分布函数的反函数。

span.span: Inverse of the normal distribution function.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseNormalDistribution(.05) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseNormalDistribution(.05); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double InverseTDistribution (double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 InverseTDistribution(float64 probability, int32 degreeOfFreedom) cil managed
Public Function InverseTDistribution (probability As Double, degreeOfFreedom As Integer) As Double
public: double InverseTDistribution(double probability, int degreeOfFreedom);

param.name: probability
param.span: F 分布的概率。

span.span: Probability for the F distribution.

param.span: 可接受的范围为 0 到 1。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: degreeOfFreedom
param.span: 自由度。

span.span: Degree of freedom.

summary.span: 反 t 分布公式计算学生 t 分布的 t 值来作为概率和自由度的函数。

span.span: The inverse *t*-distribution formula calculates the *t*-value of the Student's *t*-distribution as a function of probability and degrees of freedom.
Inverse of the *t*-distribution.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15) ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.InverseTDistribution(.05, 15); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double Mean (string inputSeriesName);

param.name: inputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象中存储需要计算均值的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the data for which the mean value is required.

summary.span: 均值公式计算数据序列中存储数据的平均值。

span.span: The mean formula calculates the average, or mean, of data stored in a data series.

returns.span: 给定序列中所有数据点的均值。

span.span: Mean value of all the data points in the given series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果名为输入的序列中不存在方法调用时，将引发异常。If named input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Mean("Series1") ``` ```csharp double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Mean("Series1"); ```

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 各数据组的平均值之间的假设差值。

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的范围为 0 到 1。

summary.span: 具有相同方差公式的 t 检验使用具有相等方差的学生 t 分布执行 t 检验。

span.span: The *t*-test with equal variances formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with equal variances.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

Public Function TTestPaired (hypothesizedMeanDifference As Double, probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As TTestResult

public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TTestResult ^ TTestPaired(double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 各数据组的平均值之间的假设差值。

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的范围为 0 到 1。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName

param.name: secondInputSeriesName

summary.span: t 检验配对公式使用具有配对样本的学生 t 分布执行 t 检验。

span.span: The *t*-test paired formula performs a *t*-test using Student's *t*-distribution with paired samples.

summary.span: 样本中存在观测的自然配对时，这将非常有用（例如，某个样本组被检验了两次）。

span.span: This is useful when there is an observed natural pairing in samples (for example, when a sample group is tested twice).
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As TTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.TTestPaired(0.2, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```

public: double Variance(System::String ^ inputSeriesName, bool sampleVariance);

param.name: inputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象中存储需要计算均值的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the data for which the mean value is required.

param.name: sampleVariance
param.span: 如果数据为人口抽样时，指定为 ；如果数据为全部人口时，则为 。

span.span: Specify if the data is a sample of a population; and if the data is the entire population.

summary.span: 方差公式计算一组数据的方差。

span.span: The variance formula calculates the variance within a group of data.
Variance within the group of data.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As Double = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Variance("Series1", false) ``` ```csharp TTestResult result = double result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.Variance("Series1", false); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ZTestResult ZTest (double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double varianceFirstGroup, double varianceSecondGroup, double probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ZTestResult ZTest(float64 hypothesizedMeanDifference, float64 varianceFirstGroup, float64 varianceSecondGroup, float64 probability, string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed

Public Function ZTest (hypothesizedMeanDifference As Double, varianceFirstGroup As Double, varianceSecondGroup As Double, probability As Double, firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As ZTestResult

public: System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ZTestResult ^ ZTest(double hypothesizedMeanDifference, double varianceFirstGroup, double varianceSecondGroup, double probability, System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

param.name: hypothesizedMeanDifference
param.span: 各数据组的平均值之间的假设差值。

span.span: Hypothesized difference between the means of the data groups.

param.name: varianceFirstGroup
param.span: 第一组数据的方差。

span.span: Variance within the first group of data.

param.name: varianceSecondGroup
param.span: 第二组数据的方差。

span.span: Variance within the second group of data.

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值。

span.span: Alpha value.

param.span: 可接受的范围为 0 到 1。

span.span: The acceptable range is between 0 and 1.

param.name: firstInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第一个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the first group's data.

param.name: secondInputSeriesName
param.span: 对象的名称，该对象存储第二个组的数据。

span.span: Name of the object that stores the second group's data.

summary.span: Z 检验公式使用正态分布执行 Z 检验。

span.span: The Z-test formula performs a Z-test using normal distribution.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此公式。The following code demonstrates how to use this formula. ```vb Dim result As ZTestResult = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2") ``` ```csharp ZTestResult result = Chart1.DataManipulator.Statistics.ZTest(0.2, 2.5, 4.5, 0.05, "Series1", "Series2"); ```
